price: ពិតប្រាកដណាស់ ពួកយើងកោតខ្លាចម្ចាស់របស់ពួកយើង នៅថ្ងៃមួយដែលម្នាក់ៗ(នៃពួកគ្មានជំនឿ)មុខក្រញូវ និងលំបាក។
arabic: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوۡمًا عَبُوسٗا قَمۡطَرِيرٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: innā nakhāfu min rabbinā yawman ʿabūsan qamṭarīran
